billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Requires contracts awarded by the state or a public authority for telephone customer service, to provide such service in the Spanish language
summary: Requires contracts, with a value of $1,000,000 or more, awarded by the state or a public authority for telephone customer service, to provide such service in the Spanish language in addition to English.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the provision of telephone customer service in the Spanish language
